Package controllers

package controllers

    Class
    Description
    addAlbumController
    The addAlbumController class allows user to add and store album to their user/profile
    addPhotoController
    Controls the addPhotoView stage for the User
    addTagController
    Controls the addTag stage for the User
    adduserController
    Controls the addUser stage accessed by the admin (administrator)
    adminController
    Controls the adminView stage for the User
    albumController
    Controls the "albumView" stage
    copyController
    Controls the "copyView" stage
    deserialize
    Utility class to deserialize User info from stored file
    editCaption
    Controls the editCaptionView stage for the user
    editController
    Controls the editView stage for the user
    loginController
    Controls the loginView stage for the user
    moveController
    Controls the moveView stage for the user
    save
    Uses OutputStreams to let us store user information
    searchController
    Opens the searchView stage for the user
